title: Brexit exposes EU power struggle as Emmanuel Macron and Angela Merkel pull in opposite directions
text:
Emmanuel Macron, once the blue-eyed boy of Brussels, is looking more and more like the EU’s bad pupil. Relations between the French President and Angela Merkel, the “Queen of Europe”, have never been so strained after last week’s EU summit in Brussels.

Tensions have long been bubbling away at the heart of the EU’s Franco-German policymaking partnership.

The poorly concealed struggle for influence between the French rising star and the grizzled German veteran has bitterly disappointed those who dreamed the ardently pro-EU pair could force a great leap forward in EU integration.

Brexit was meant to have cleared one of the greatest obstacles to more Europe - the UK. Ironically, it has forced...
description: Emmanuel Macron, once the blue-eyed boy of Brussels, is looking more and more like the EU’s bad pupil.
